topics.body:
So I've gotten back into minecraft and wow a lot of mods items are redundant.

At least they fucking work now.  I remember the days when you had to be super careful or else you'd crash your game.


What would be cool is if someone made a mod that took all the popular ones, copied the functions, massively simplified it and made all the machine blocks' recipes made out of vanilla blocks.
